title: I dreamed that my friend was pregnant. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this vision?

preview.html: I dreamed that my friend was pregnant, so what did Ibn Sirin say about this vision? I dreamed that my friend was pregnant. What is the accurate interpretation of this vision? Does getting pregnant with a boy have different meanings and connotations than getting pregnant with a girl? How did interpreters interpret this vision? Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. I dreamed that my friend was pregnant. Pregnancy in a dream is a symbol of hatred, and the jurists said that it is evidence of sadness, depression, and many fears. There are other symbols that appear with the symbol of pregnancy that indicate sadness, and they are as follows: Or not: When the dreamer sees her friend pregnant in a dream, her clothes are shabby. Her body is dirty and her appearance is completely different from the reality. The vision shows severe problems and conflicts that this friend suffers from in her life. Second: If an unmarried woman dreams of her pregnant friend and she cries and screams, then seeing symbols of pregnancy and screaming is a sign of a strong crisis that she will meet with this friend and it may be a problem related to With money or health. Third: When the dreamer’s friend appears, and she is pregnant, with long hair and in bad condition, the vision confirms the increase in worries and anxiety that are invading her life. Fourth: But if this friend is naked and pregnant in the dream, then this scene shows a major problem related to her honor, Or in clearer terms, she may be affected by a major scandal in the society in which she lives, and this scandal causes her distress and distress. Fifth: When an unmarried woman sees her friend pregnant in a dream and unable to move because of the severe pain she feels from the pregnancy, the dream indicates the presence of a problem and anguish. It is dangerous for this friend to suffer from, but she will be weaker than him and will not want to. Be able to deal with it. I dreamed that my friend was pregnant with Ibn Sirin. Seeing Ibn Sirin’s pregnancy does not indicate kindness, but if the dreamer’s friend was pregnant in the dream and did not care about the pain of pregnancy and went here and there without any restrictions, then this indicates her adaptation to difficulties, he is brave and wonderful. . He faces problems with a steady heart and never gives in to attacks. And if it appears in the dream that the dreamer’s friend was pregnant and gave birth to her child safely, then the symbolic pregnancy and birth certificate is evidence of difficult life affairs that will end, God willing, after a while. It was said in some visions that the unmarried woman who dreams of her friend As if she is pregnant, the dream will be interpreted as a crisis and problem that is specific to the dreamer and not to her friend, but if she gave birth to her. The dream, then the anguish and sadness she experienced will end quickly, and if she sees that her friend is pregnant in the first or second month, then the dream indicates the prolongation of the woman’s problems and the abundance of her sorrows, but there is no lasting sadness forever, and a day will come when he will feel comfortable and his worries will disappear. She dreamed My friend is pregnant alone. Seeing pregnancy for an unmarried girl means four bad interpretations, which are as follows: Or not: Perhaps the dreamer’s friend has contracted a serious illness that makes her anxious because her life will stop because of that, and whenever this girl appears in pain from pregnancy, the scene at that time shows the seriousness of the illness that She suffers from it. Second: This friend’s fears may be due to many problems in her love life, even

title: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing rain in a dream is one of the dreams that makes a person happy, and it has many interpretations made by the most famous interpretation scholars in the Arab world. The interpretation of a dream varies depending on the social status of the person and the events that occurred in the dream. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous scholars of dream interpretation in the Arab countries, as he interpreted most of the dreams that happen to humans. An indication of the food and goodness that a person enjoys. Precipitation Heavy rain with thunderstorms indicates imminent danger. Seeing rain falling on a specific place indicates the grief and sorrow that a person is going through. Heavy rain indicates an earthquake, war, or disaster. Seeing rain from the window of the house or from the door indicates that the dreamer Live safely. Rain in the summer indicates the collapse of problems and the achievement of many benefits. Rain in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good relationship with his Lord and the righteousness of his religion. Sudden rain falling indicates the spread of an epidemic and disease at this time. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream according to NabulsiImam Nabulsi will interpret the dream of seeing rain In a dream, it has many different interpretations depending on the social status of the dreamer, and the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi is as follows: Stones falling from the sky instead of water indicate that a person is committing many sins. Rain falling on plants to grow indicates goodness and blessings for a person. Uprooting trees due to heavy rain in a dream indicates the presence of many temptations and misfortunes that people go through. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single woman. There are many different interpretations of seeing rain for a single girl, which have been interpreted by many interpretation scholars known for their fairness, and the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single girl. The one is as follows: Good news for the one who is approaching her marriage to a person of good character and morals and with whom she will live a happy life. The light rain indicates the sweet and sweet talk that the girl hears from the person she loves. The sound of rain and thunder indicates many different upcoming events that will frighten and frighten them. Interpretation Seeing rain in a dream for a married woman. Interpretations of dreams vary depending on the personal situation and events that occurred in the dream. One of these dreams is seeing rain, as interpreters interpreted it for a married woman as follows: an indication of goodness and a lot of food that it brings. Rain falling during prostration indicates the stability of her life. Marriage with her husband. An indication that God gives her sons and daughters. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a pregnant woman: The dream of seeing rain in a dream is one of the happy dreams that bring goodness to come, especially for pregnant women, according to different interpretations of well-known interpretation scholars in Arab countries, and the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream. About a pregnant woman as follows: Rainfall in the winter may indicate that the time of birth is approaching, and she will be in good health as the newborn. Rainfall in the summer indicates the arrival of happy news and joy. The condition of the pregnant woman and her fetus is in good health.

title: Interpretation of a dream about flying insects by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flying insects in a dream: Seeing insects is one of the visions that the dreamer is not sure of in his dream, due to the widespread belief that insects are a bad omen and do not portend anything good, and that seeing them brings worries and problems. This belief may be correct, and the vision varies and carries only one sign. Insects may crawl, or they may fly, and in that case it is not possible to resort to a single explanation, and what concerns us in this part is mentioning it. The meaning of flying insects in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of flying insects in a dream. Seeing insects symbolizes a storm that carries with it many problems and many conflicts whose owner does not know the reason for their appearance. If the insects are harmful, whether they fly or crawl, this indicates enemies who are waiting for the dreamer and who bear a grudge against him. And they try, on every occasion that brings them together, to seize an opportunity to harm him. Insects symbolize physical exhaustion and sharp fluctuations in health and materials. Seeing flying insects in a dream means that people are watching the dreamer from afar and attacking him from afar, causing his energies to be depleted in the face of unknown enemies. Flying insects indicate The problems that the viewer is exposed to gradually or sequentially, and the problems that he faces do not come all at once, but rather come gradually. Flying insects can be a sign of corruption in the company, forbidden walking and many actions that have unpleasant consequences. And if these insects fly into his house This indicates cunning, envy, and a restless eye that does not hesitate to stop watching the people of the house, follow their behavior, and hate their quiet and happy lifestyle. Seeing crawling insects indicates slowness in suffering, or in other words. This vision expresses the things that the viewer is exposed to in his life, which cause him crises and diseases that continue with him for a long time and cause him sadness and tragedies. Difficult circumstances afflict him gradually and painfully. The vision symbolizes primitive torture methods, as if the person was subjected to repeated stab wounds or successive electrical charges, instead of taking the full charge in one day and dropping dead. Flying insects indicate old disputes that rise to the surface and disrupt the life of the fortuneteller. And the vision Escaping from this is praiseworthy, as it means that the end of the crises and conflicts that the viewer has experienced will soon end. Also, seeing dead insects is evidence of the collapse of worries and the removal of obstacles that dampen the viewer’s spirit and spoil his life. But if he sees insects dead and then finds them returning to life, this indicates Things that the fortuneteller thinks have passed and no longer appear, and he is later surprised that these things are still present and their effects are horrific. If the fortuneteller kills insects, this indicates firm plans, serious thinking, and a decision taken to remove all problems and obstacles that stand in his way. And if you see that you are hunting these insects Without harming you, it means that you know your enemies well and are watching what they hide for you, and this is a victory for you, but you feel the weight of this matter on you, because most of the enemies were near you, which makes you feel exhausted and

title: Interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the eye in a dream or a dream through the website Roy2a.com. The human eye is a spherical network located in the front of the skull that contains six special muscles to move it. The eye has more than one color, such as honey, green, blue, and black. When does a person see the eye in a dream? Different pictures, there is definitely an indication of his vision, so today we will take a break from the most important interpretations that came from great scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Imam Al. - Sadiq Hawalli Seeing an eye in a dream Follow us. Interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream Seeing an eye in a dream in white is a sign of suffering from worries and sorrows, and getting rid of them is a sign of happiness and almost comfort. Seeing many eyes on the viewer’s body indicates an abundance of worship, obedience, and good intentions. Seeing a bullet or injury With the eye indicates the presence of an enemy lurking over the viewer to harm him. If someone sees me, then we see one eye in the dream indicating his corruption and lack of religion or the death of one of his children or the loss of half of his money. Seeing blindness in a dream can indicate estrangement and travel indicates a decline in religion. Seeing The return of sight in a dream after blindness indicates repentance, guidance, and the coming of truth after falsehood. Seeing redness in the eye indicates struggles and problems that lead to separation. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing eyeliner or eye design in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that he sees the eye. In a dream, it refers to everything that a person enjoys, such as children, money, the condition of the eyes in a dream, and the events of visions that indicate whether they are good or bad. Seeing an eye in a dream denotes a man’s religion, beliefs, and insight. Seeing an eye in a dream is to distinguish between right and wrong, good and evil. Seeing kohl in the eye for decoration is a sign of happiness and good news. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing an eyebrow in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream for a single woman. Seeing blood bleeding from the eye in a girl’s dream indicates sin or illicit gains. Seeing an injury in a girl’s eye indicates worries and anxieties in her life. If a girl sees that her eye color has changed to another color, it is an unpleasant vision that foretells bad circumstances for her. Seeing a beautiful eye indicates the presence of one person in a dream on the approach of her marriage to someone she wants. Seeing the loss of an eye in a dream means for a girl due to the death of someone close to her or her physical loss. Seeing blood coming out of the eye may indicate that an unmarried woman will marry someone who is not suitable for her. Interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a wound in a married woman’s eye is a sign of problems and instability in her life. Seeing the loss of an eye in a dream for a married woman is a sign of separation between her and her husband or the death of someone His family members. Seeing the eye coming out in a dream means for a married woman the presence of her enemies around her who are planning her machinations, envy and hatred. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing eye strain in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eyes in a dream for a woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the mouth from someone I know

preview.html: But there are other interpretations and meanings of kissing in dreams, and a kiss on the mouth differs from a kiss on the cheek, neck, hand, and foot in interpretation, and we will talk about that in detail in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth from someone I know in a dream for a single girl. A kiss on the mouth from a familiar face in a girl’s dream It indicates the benefits and interests that the dreamer will gain from her, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees someone she loves kissing her on the mouth in a dream. He will often praise her and express his feelings to her, and God knows best. A kiss on the cheek in a dream for an unmarried woman is interpreted as Asking for forgiveness and pardon from the person who has wronged him. Kissing animals in a dream is interpreted as following desires. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the cheek for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth from someone I know in a dream about a married woman. When a married woman dreams of her husband kissing her on the mouth. This is one of the soul’s obsessions or its constant need for familiarity, and God knows best. If a man kisses his wife on the cheek in a dream, he is apologizing to her for what he did to her. A kiss on the neck is gratitude from her husband. Seeing a married woman kissing life in a dream means that her affairs will ease and her distress will go away. And that Because the snake in a dream symbolizes life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth from someone I know in a dream about a man and its meaning. Ibn Sirin says: If a man kisses a man, then he knows in a dream. There are benefits and rewards between them, but on the condition that the kiss is without desire. If a man kisses An old man in his mouth in a dream, this is evidence of gaining knowledge. Kissing children in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is a friendly and tolerant person. Seeing a dog being kissed in a dream indicates helping a foolish person. Kissing strangers on the cheek in a dream is kindness to others, and a kiss On the neck to pay off debts. The meaning of seeing a kiss on the mouth from someone I know in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Interpretation scholars say: When a pregnant woman sees her husband kissing her on the mouth in a dream. A sign that he has a son who resembles his father, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman kisses her husband’s shoulder in a dream She asks him for help in performing some of her duties and responsibilities. A kiss on the cheek in a pregnant woman’s dream from an unknown person indicates the birth of a girl. Kissing animals in a dream is undesirable and represents the dangers of childbirth. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on The mouth of someone I know in a dream for young people and its meaning. Seeing someone kissing a friend on the mouth in a dream means many appeals to him and attention to his affairs. Whoever kisses the neck of his friend in a dream will have his debt repaid, and God knows best. When a young man sees in a dream as if he is kissing a familiar face from his eyes. This is evidence. However, the dreamer will marry a girl from this person’s relatives. Kissing an unknown girl in a dream is a sign that a single person will get married soon. Kissing an unknown girl in a dream is a sign that a single woman will marry soon. Kissing an old woman in a dream apologizes for a hurtful word he said. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth of someone I know in a divorced woman’s dream. If a divorced woman kisses her father in Her mouth in a dream. This is evidence of her gratitude to

title: Interpretation of seeing a sick person who is actually healthy

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sick, healthy person in a single girl’s dream: Seeing dreams may be pleasant or unpleasant depending on the place and time of the dreamer, and differ from one person to another, as we will explain below: Seeing a sick person in a dream for an unmarried woman, and he is in fact healthy, then this vision indicates difficulties. And the crises that she is going through. If a girl sees in a dream that her father is suffering from an illness and is already dead, this indicates the father’s need to plead with her and give him charity. Seeing a healthy person dying in a dream is evidence of that person’s long life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a sick person And it is truly healthy for a married woman. Seeing the dreamer sick despite recovery and enjoyment of health indicates thinking and fear about an important matter, in addition to: If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is sick and he is in good health, then this is in reality a sign of her debts and fears that she is going through and will end, God willing. Seeing that she is sick and suffering from a serious illness, and in fact she was not suffering from illnesses, is evidence of a change in her situation. A married woman’s dream that she is sick and then recovers in a dream is evidence of paying off debts and the end of sadness and anxiety from that woman’s life. Interpretation of seeing a sick person in good health for a woman Pregnant: A pregnant woman feels confused and anxious if she dreams of seeing a sick or dead person, so we will explain the meaning of the vision below: If a pregnant woman sees that she is sick and does not suffer from an illness, this indicates her fear that the time of birth is approaching, but she will be fine. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream while she is dying when in reality Suffering from an illness means recovery and a long life, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a sick and healthy person in reality for a man. Interpretation of dreams about a sick friend of mine visiting the hospital and he was in good health and did not suffer from an illness in reality. Evidence of intense love and care for him. If the husband sees in a dream that his wife is sick and she enters The hospital, as she is sick in reality. Evidence of the husband’s attitude toward his wife, his loyalty to her, and his love for her. Seeing a healthy person suffering from an illness in a dream indicates the fears and problems that the dreamer suffers from. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a sick person in good health for a young man. If he sees When a young man sees in a dream a sick friend of his who is actually suffering from an illness, this indicates a speedy recovery, and God knows best. When seeing a sick person visiting an unknown person in a dream, This vision indicates growth and positivity in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a truly healthy patient by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing a patient dying in a dream is one of the dreams that make the dreamer feel anxious and afraid because of the patient’s death. Evidence of longevity and recovery from illness. And when you see a dead person afflicted with a disease, this is evidence of... The dead person’s need for charity, and the dreamer’s prayers, and God knows best. For a married woman to see in a dream that her son has fallen ill and that he is in good health in reality, this is evidence of the debts and fears that she is experiencing now. Interpretation of seeing a sick person in good health by Al-NabulsiHealing from an illness in a dream, And it was

title: What is the interpretation of a single woman dreaming of a dog in a dream?

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a pet dog in a dream is the most accurate interpretation of seeing dogs as a pet in a dream, especially for an unmarried girl. It is one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicates that she has a good and pure character. Heart, because dogs are a sign of love, and if the dreamer sees a pet dog, then it is his. A good man who loves life. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing white dogs as a sign that there is a good young man around her who will marry her and have a good husband. Seeing a dog in a girl’s house is interpreted as a sign that goodness is coming into her life and that what she desires will soon come true. If a woman sees a large number of dogs in her house, this indicates the betrayal of someone close to her, perhaps her fiancé or one of her friends. Playing with dogs in a dream by eye. Many girls dream of some dreams that carry meanings and repercussions that are difficult for us to interpret. Seeing playing with dogs in a dream is one of the most common dreams that a common woman requests for interpretation, and for this reason in this paragraph we discuss the interpretation of these dreams and also present the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, all of this in the following lines. The interpretation of seeing a woman playing with dogs in a dream depends on the color of the dog In the dream. If a girl sees that she is touching black toys, this is evidence that there is someone in her life who hates everything that is good for her and is causing her problems, and she must stay away from him and not deal with him. Seeing a white dog in an unmarried girl’s dream means that someone is trying to seduce her and will be her best friend and companion in life. Her life. As for the old young woman who sees a red dog, this is a sign that crises are coming in her life, and she must be vigilant and face them with care until they end and life returns to its normal course. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a girl dealing with a small dog is evidence that she is a girl with good morals, religion, and a good reputation. As for seeing a prostitute in a girl’s dream, it is a sign of the presence of an imaginary friend in her life who expresses her love for her, but she has malice and hatred, and she must stay away from her and accompany her. Escaping from dogs in a dream for individuals. After considering the interpretation of seeing dogs as a pet in a dream for a public woman at the beginning of the article, in this paragraph we consider the interpretation of escaping from dogs in a dream for a public woman in detail below. Seeing dogs in a dream is an annoying dream for many people, but Seeing a dreamer running away from dogs is a sign that you will get rid of problems and fears in your life and you will be able to overcome them and return to a life full of calm and tranquility. As for the general girl who sees herself running away from dogs in a dream, this indicates her distance from the evil people around her, and if the girl An engaged woman ends her relationship with him after discovering that he is not. Suitable for her. Interpretation and visionary scholars interpreted the dream of an unmarried girl running away from dogs as a person capable of facing crises, overcoming difficulties, and overcoming every obstacle in her life. Some commentators mentioned that a girl seeing in a dream a pack of dogs chasing her as she tries to escape from them, assuming that it is I committed some sins and this

title: Interpretation of buying clothes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of buying clothes in a dream for one girl. Interpreters differed on this matter. It is a matter of many different interpretations. As we know, the interpretation depends most of the time on the social status of the fortuneteller. Now we start with freedom: Commentators said that the presence of clothes in a dream is good news for entering into a new and different life. Buying clothes for unmarried women in her dream is a sign that the girl will enter into a new matter, such as engagement or marriage. The presence of new clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates happiness in life. And also progress in professional or academic life, God willing, and achieving the desired goal. If she The clothes are new and clean, this indicates happiness and joy. If they are old and dirty, it is interpreted as entering a period of great sadness and misguidance. If an unmarried woman sees that she is buying underwear, it indicates to her that she will make a big mistake and she must be careful. If old clothes are bought, They are replaced with new clothes. This indicates that a period of her life has changed for the better by God’s command. When a single woman dreams of buying children’s clothes. This indicates that she will be engaged to a good, good-natured person. If the clothes are white, explain to her that she loves someone very much. And she wants to marry him. Buying clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman and then losing them, explains that an obstacle will happen to her in her life. And if she finds the clothes again, explain that she will overcome this obstacle by God’s command. See also: Interpretation of dreams about clothes on the floor. Interpretation of seeing buying clothes in A dream for a married woman: There are many different interpretations in this regard, and we will talk about them all, God willing, and we hope that all interpretations are good. Seeing buying new clothes in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon. This is also interpreted as happy news about her married life. If she sees A married woman sees herself taking clothes from a dead person, so he explained to her that she will fall into major marital problems. Old, dilapidated clothes are interpreted by the sadness and poverty that the married woman will face in the coming period and she must be careful about her actions. Buying children’s clothes in a married woman’s dream means that the problem of childbearing will end Pregnancy will happen soon, God willing. If it is a girl’s clothes, then she will give birth to a female with beautiful features, and the exact opposite if it is a boy’s clothes. If the clothes purchased in a married woman’s dream are an abaya, this interprets that this woman has great coverage and purity. It is sometimes interpreted as the presence Anxiety and sadness in her life for the coming time. A husband who gives his wife new clothes in a dream indicates that the husband loves his wife very much. Buying a dress in a married woman’s dream means stability in her married life and her husband’s intense love for her. If the dress is white, this means that the woman will be happy in the future. Her life. And if the dress you bought is black, it is interpreted as sadness and upcoming concern for the woman. Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream about a man and its meaning Buying clothes for a man in a dream is interpreted as a

title: Interpretation of dates in a dream Seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dating dream for a single girl, married, pregnant woman, divorced, for a man whether eating dates, yellow, black, red, green, buying dates, eating dates, eating dates, picking dates. Distribution by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and othersDating in a dream is one of the dreams that we see in a very large and intense way because of our constant connection to dating in public life, and many people are very fond of dating, and it is one of the beautiful fruits that provides the body with a lot of energy and vitality. It was recommended by the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. And peace be upon him. And the meanings that appear to us in our dreams are mysterious dreams. Interpretation of dates in a dream If you dream of seeing dates in a dream above trees, this indicates a happy and fruitful marriage, but if you eat them while preparing them for trade, this portends need and sadness. In a dream, it is a provision, or a good messenger. Whoever sees that he is eating dates will benefit from lawful money. Dates are money that does not last, and whoever sees dates getting wet means that he will be happy and benefit from them. Dates are lawful money that does not last. It has been said: Whoever sees that he has cut a date from a palm tree, then he will be blessed with a child, and if he eats from it, he will inherit the child. Eating dates in a dream means legitimate livelihood and money, and dates are also interpreted as a good messenger. Seeing dates on the tree indicates a happy and fruitful marriage. He saw dates as a beggar, it is a source of pleasure and benefit alongside him, and the beggar: lawful sustenance, healing and relief. Whoever dreams of eating something wet at a time other than his time will receive healing, blessings, and joy, according to the story of Mary, peace be upon her, and that happened in his time. It was said: Eating dates is the dew of the eye, so the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: Tonight I saw as if I was in the house of Abu Rafi’ and we came with fresh dates from Ibn Tab. We will explain to you in our article the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream as explained to it by the great interpreter Ibn Shaheen, the interpreter of dreams. In its various interpretations we assure you correctly and explain its different meanings. Interpretation of dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a handful of dates in a dream means great savings in life. Collecting dates in a dream is evidence of collecting money and money for saving. Wetting dates in trees in a dream is evidence that the next few days will bring a lot of relaxation and happiness. Big things in life. Eating dates in a dream is a sign of stress and anxiety about some things in life. A date tree in a dream is a sign of money and good news. Eating dates in a dream is a sign of the success of a big project. Eating false dates in a dream means that A person does not need to eat and drink in his life. Dates in a dream indicate a person’s healthy psychological state. The need for a date in a dream is evidence of the need for great and significant attention in life. Seeing dates in a dream is evidence of acquiring legitimate wealth and obtaining various sources of income. Examining dates in a dream is evidence of trying to discover all the hidden problems in your life. Eating a lot of dates in a dream is a sign of victory and profit in projects. Eating red dates is...
